pkgmetadata.longdescription: Isomorphism Check for Multi-Stage Factorial Designs with Randomization Restrictions // Contains functions to check the isomorphism of multi-stage factorial designs with randomisation restrictions based on balanced spreads and balanced covering stars of PG(n-1,2) as described in Spencer, Ranjan and Mendivil (2019) doi:10.1007/s42519-019-0064-5.
